DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate with sufficient precision and according to gender the determining independent factors of quality of life related to respiratory status of patient with moderate to severe COPD.
DOC.brief_title: Factors Determining Quality of Life Related to Respiratory Status According to Gender of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult patient who has a clinical visit for their usual followup. patient with COPD with at least a three month follow up Current or history of asthma Current participation in an interventional clinical study
DOC.keyword: Evaluation According to Gender the Determining Independent Factors of Quality of Life Related to Respiratory Status of Patient With Moderate to Severe COPD
